name: rakuten_holiday_jp
description: Get holidays in Japan with Rakuten Holiday's added as published

scripts.generate: git submodule update; cd holiday_jp/; git fetch origin master;  cd ../; node scripts/generate.js
scripts.build: npm run generate; webpack; node scripts/build.js;rm scripts/rakuten_holiday_jp_webpacked.js;cd ./release/; uglifyjs rakuten_holiday_jp.js -c -m --source-map -o rakuten_holiday_jp.min.js

author: Ken Cheung
